title: Balance a Flight Control Surface
description: After being repainted, an aileron must be re-balanced to prevent aerodynamic flutter.

tasks.description: Mount the aileron on a balancing rig.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the aileron for balancing.

tasks.description: Check the balance of the aileron and compare it to the specifications in the maintenance manual.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the aileron is out of balance.

tasks.description: Add or remove balance weights at specified locations until the aileron is balanced within the required tolerance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully balances the aileron and documents the final weight configuration.
